document_data.name: Handrorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Handrorn''' was a [[human]] blacksmith that lived in [[Khôltar]], the Iron City, in the mid– to late–[[:Category:4th century|4{{th}} century]] [[DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|83}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 63: Khôltar, Part 14, A Brief History of Khôltar, Part 1}}
document_data.Description: Handrorn was a burly blacksmith, described as a gigantic man.
document_data.Abilities: He was a skilled armorer because he crafted a suit of armor for himself.
